meanings.sent1: She wore a very stylish dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The actress always looks stylish on the red carpet.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat tried to look stylish with a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence shone through, making her as stylish as a runway model.
meanings.sent5: The stylish outfit made heads turn wherever she went.

meanings.definition: Having a distinctive or attractive appearance
meanings.sent1: The vintage car had a stylish design that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: His new haircut gave him a stylish look.
meanings.sent3: The tree in the backyard was so stylish that birds lined up to perch on it.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a stylish blend of colors.
meanings.sent5: The stylish painting added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a fashionable sense of clothing or accessories
meanings.sent1: She always knew how to put together a stylish outfit.
meanings.sent2: The boutique offered a range of stylish accessories.
meanings.sent3: The penguin looked quite stylish in its tuxedo.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of style was so stylish, it became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The stylish scarf completed her winter look perfectly.
